item.title: Back to Hugo for This Blog
item.description: The very first time I started blogging I used a Java based blogging platform called Pebble. If you look at it, you’ll understand how long ago that was. Blogging had just become something people did and I had some level of success mostly due to the newness of it all. I was writing “how-to” articles and they seemed to resonate. At that time I was also heavily involved with CodeRanch, formally known as JavaRanch. So I would often take my answers there, and expound on them on my blog.
